content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position (x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not out of fuel

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not missing ingredients

### Errors when using entities without being connected to a network
- Ensure that entities are connected to the necessary networks (e.g. electric, fluid) before attempting to use them
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are properly connected

### Errors when using entities without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are properly plugged in

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
